DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate efficacy safety administration lubiprostone patient irritable bowel syndrome constipation .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Lubiprostone Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation
DOC.criteria: 18 year age older Stable fiber therapy Normal colonoscopy/sigmoidoscopy Able refrain use medication know treat associate constipation symptom Experiences abdominal discomfort/pain associate bowel movement Reports decrease bowel movement frequency and/or symptom associate constipation Diarrheapredominant alternating ( diarrhea constipation cycling ) irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) , constipation associate IBS Open gastrointestinal abdominal surgery prior IBS onset Organic bowel disorder , mechanical bowel obstruction , pseudoobstruction , unexplained weight loss rectal bleed Uncontrolled cardiovascular , liver lung disease , neurologic psychiatric disorder , systemic disease , abnormal laboratory test per investigator discretion If female , currently pregnant nursing , plan become pregnant nurse clinical study
